turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello, I would like to order a coffee drink from Peets.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How are you doing? That should not be a problem.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Where do you want to order the drink at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to make an order from Peet on 10th Street in Dallas, Texas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sounds good, what type of coffee would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order a Caffe Mocha, large, non-fat milk, and a little whip cream on top.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it, I will make that as soon as possible.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Also, include some type of honey as well.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I will add that as well.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem. Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that is it for now.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sounds great, your drink is now on the local store.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How long before I can go and pick up the coffee drink?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your coffee drink will be available to pick up in 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sounds great!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Also, your receipt will be sent to your mobile via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you so much!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You are welcome.
